name: A Bun in the Dark: Yotsuba's Journey Home (Demo)
name_original: A Bun in the Dark: Yotsuba's Journey Home (Demo)
description:
Little Yotsuba likes to journey through forests and fields to forage for berries and vegetables in her free time. On a nice day she found a nice big bushel of raspberries in the forested hills away from home, so she sat down and ate some and enjoyed the day. But she accidently fell asleep and woke up to find day had turned to night. With only a broken solar charging lantern her sister left in the backpack she took with her, she now has to make her way home.

Controls: WASD or ARROW Keys to move.  SPACE bar to start. 

Game Demo (Initial GameJam build from QuickJam#1: 'Light' theme.)
